description: Leona Kingscholar is a 20-year-old muscular young man, the arrogant but cunning leader of Savanaclaw dorm at Night Raven College.  He's a third-year student repeating a year due to laziness, but possesses a sharp tactical mind.  His lion-like features and regal attire contrast with his relaxed demeanor, hinting at his princely background and hidden depths of loyalty and protectiveness towards his dorm mates.
